config-option.big-chests-menu.name: 大型物品栏菜单
config-option.big-chests-menu.descriptio: 默认情况下使物品栏菜单变大.
config-option.enable-scrolling.name: 启用滚动
config-option.enable-scrolling.descripti: 启用在物品栏菜单中上下滚动.
config-option.enable-search.name: 启用搜索
config-option.enable-search.description: 在物品栏菜单中启用搜索栏.
config-option.make-unlimited.name: 无限制
config-option.make-unlimited.description: 使物品栏类型可以容纳无限数量的物品.
config-option.show-arrows.name: 显示箭头按钮
config-option.show-arrows.description: 在物品栏菜单上显示箭头按钮.
config-option.toggle-search.name: 切换搜索
config-option.toggle-search.description: 按键绑定以切换搜索栏的显示或隐藏.
